title: Robotic drones are revealing secrets about nature's deadliest hurricanes
description: Wind-propelled, solar-powered drones are designed to sail into hurricanes to collect data about oceanic and atmospheric conditions for hurricane forecasting.
content: Have you ever wondered why some hurricanes transform from relatively mild storms into monsters in just a day? This process, called rapid intensification, is one of the biggest challenges in hurricane… [+5187 chars]
de: Roboterdrohnen enthüllen Geheimnisse über die tödlichsten Hurrikane der Natur. Wind- und solarbetriebene Drohnen sollen in Hurrikane hineinfliegen, um Daten über ozeanische und atmosphärische Bedingungen für die Hurrikanvorhersage zu sammeln.
en: Robotic drones are revealing secrets about nature's deadliest hurricanes. Wind-propelled, solar-powered drones are designed to sail into hurricanes to collect data about oceanic and atmospheric conditions for hurricane forecasting.
la: Fuci robotici secreta de naturae turbines maximos detegunt. Vento-propelli, fuci solares potentes ordinantur in procellas navigare ad notitias colligendas de conditionibus oceanicis et atmosphaericis pro venturo praevidendo.

title: Tropical Storm Debby forms in the Gulf of Mexico, expected to reach hurricane strength before landfall in Florida | CNN
description: Tropical Storm Debby has sustained winds of 40 mph and is located about 270 miles south of Tampa, Florida, according to the hurricane center’s 8 p.m. ET update on the storm.
content:

Der Tropensturm Debby hat anhaltende Windgeschwindigkeiten von 40 Meilen pro Stunde und befindet sich nach Angaben des Hurrikanzentrums um 20 Uhr etwa 270 Meilen südlich von Tampa, Florida. en: Tropical Storm Debby forms in the Gulf of Mexico, expected to reach hurricane strength before landfall in Florida | CNN. Tropical Storm Debby has sustained winds of 40 mph and is located about 270 miles south of Tampa, Florida, according to the hurricane center’s 8 p.m. ET update on the storm.
la: Tropical Tempestas Debby formas in Sinu Mexicano, expectat ut impetus tempestatis ante lapsum in Florida | Rhoncus. Tropical Storm Debby ventos 40 mph sustinuit et circiter 270 milia passuum in meridiem Tampa, Florida est, secundum centrum procellarum 8 a.m. ET renovatio in tempestate.

title: Depression becomes Tropical Storm Debby as it aims at Florida's Gulf Coast
description: A front that moved past Cuba overnight has strengthened Saturday into Tropical Storm Debby as it aimed its impacts at the west coast of Florida, impacts that could be hurricane-like, federal forecasters said.

en: Depression becomes Tropical Storm Debby as it aims at Florida's Gulf Coast. A front that moved past Cuba overnight has strengthened Saturday into Tropical Storm Debby as it aimed its impacts at the west coast of Florida, impacts that could be hurricane-like, federal forecasters said.
la: Depressio Tropical Tempestas Debby fit dum in ora sinus Floridae tendit. A fronte quae praeter Cuba pernoctare movetur Saturni in Tropical Debby confirmavit, ut eius impulsus ad oram Floridae occidentalem intenderet, de impactibus qui vadum foederati instar venti esse poterant.

title: Florida prepares for the arrival of a strengthening Tropical Storm Debby
description: The storm is expected to reach hurricane-strength before it makes landfall in Florida on Monday. It could drop record-breaking rainfall amounts in parts of Georgia and South Carolina.

en: Florida prepares for the arrival of a strengthening Tropical Storm Debby. The storm is expected to reach hurricane-strength before it makes landfall in Florida on Monday. It could drop record-breaking rainfall amounts in parts of Georgia and South Carolina.
